alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Craighead County through 330 AM CDT... At 257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cash, or 8 miles south of Bono, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Lake City, Bay, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Cash, Egypt, Black Oak, Hergett, Apt, Delfore, Valley View, Macey, Gum Point, Farrville, Lester, Winesburg, Cary and Lache Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
